code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Login from'./components/Auth/Login';import Register from'./components/Auth/Register';import Quiz from'./components/Trivia/Quiz';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[showRegister,setShowRegister]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const savedUser=localStorage.getItem('user');if(savedUser)setUser(savedUser);},[]);const handleAuth=username=>{localStorage.setItem('user',username);setUser(username);};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('user');setUser(null);};if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowRegister(!showRegister),children:showRegister?'Ya tengo cuenta':'Registrarse'}),showRegister?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{onAuth:handleAuth}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onAuth:handleAuth})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["\xA1Hola, ",user,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Cerrar sesi\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Quiz,{})]});};export default App;
